name: Handmade Miniature Soft Sculpture Penguin
description:
Add a touch of fun to your home with this beautifully handmade felt penguin soft sculpture, known as Pedro the Penguin.

Pedro the Penguin is a lovely little character that seems to always be looking at you with a question in his mind.

This collectible miniature sculpture is carefully handmade from wool felt by Laura Mirjami and he is weighted down which makes him to stand without toppling over too easily and he could be even used as a little paperweight.

He would make a delightful addition to your home or as a gift as he comes in a lovely presentation box with a snowflake and penguin pattern by Faisal Khouja.

Inspiration for this quirky penguin comes from Laura's imagination and stories that she writes from her magical childhood amongst the creatures, forests, lakes and beaches of Finland.

Handmade to order.

Pedro the Penguin is handmade by using good quality 100% wool felt fabrics, filled with Eco-friendly polyester and steel pellets.

Approx. height 6.5cm, width 4.5cm, depth 4.5cm, approx 120g

Please note: as the item is individually handmade it will vary slightly from the photographs, thus making each item unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Miniature Frog Soft Sculpture
description:
Add some delight to your house with this wonderful handmade felt frog soft sculpture.

Croaker the Frog is a wonderful little character that is handmade to order by Laura Mirjami and would love to be sitting in your home and bring a little colour and delight.

He would also make a lovely collectible miniature gift for any animal lover.

He comes in a presentation box with a delightful lily and frog design by artist Faisal Khouja.

Croaker the Frog is one of the many characters that Laura Mirjami has created inspired by her magical childhood amongst the creatures, forests, lakes and beaches of Finland.

Croaker the frog is handmade from 100% wool felt fabrics.

Filled with Eco-friendly polyester and steel pellets.

Eyes are handmade black glass.

Approx. height 5.5cm, width 5cm, depth 5cm, approx 120g

Please note: As all my items are individually handmade they will vary slightly. Hence each frog has a look of its own which makes each one unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Miniature Soft Sculpture Badger
description:
Meet Bernard the Badger, delightful handmade felt soft sculpture.

This collectible miniature badger is carefully handmade by Laura Mirjami with an attention to the detail and it comes in a presentation box that has a beautiful badger and rose pattern by Faisal Khouja.

It would make a wonderful gift and it would love to sit on a table or a mantle piece and watch the world go by. He is also weighted and would make a perfect little paperweight.

Bernard the Badger is one of the latest characters that Laura Mirjami has created inspired by her magical childhood amongst beautiful wild nature and animals of Finland.

Bernard the Badger is handmade by using 100% good quality wool felt.

Filled with Eco-friendly polyester and steel pellets. Eyes are semi-precious stone onyx.

Approx. height 5 x width 5 x depth 9cm, approx 120g

Please note: As this item is individually handmade it will vary slightly from the photographs. Thus each badger has a look of its own which makes each one unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Miniature Soft Sculpture Owl
description:
Ollie, the miniature soft sculpture owl is bound to bring a smile to your face, especially if you are an owl lover!

This lovely handmade collectible felt owl would love to sit in your house and bring a little bit of joy to your life.

He is carefully handmade to order by Laura Mirjami with attention to detail and as he is weighted, there is no worry of him toppling over and he would also make a fun, little paperweight.

He comes in a lovely presentation box with an owl and pine design by Faisal Khouja and would make a perfect gift for any bird or animal lover.

Ollie the Owl was the very first character that Laura Mirjami came up with four years ago inspired by her magical childhood amongst the creatures, forests, lakes and beaches of Finland.

Ollie the Owl is handmade from 100% wool felt fabrics, filled with Eco-friendly polyester and steel pellets.

Eyes are handmade glass and eye brows and orange beak are wool.

Approx. height 6cm, width 5cm, depth 5cm, approx. 120g

Please note: As this item is individually handmade it will vary slightly from the photographs. Thus each owl has a look of its own which makes each one unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Miniature Soft Sculpture Mouse
description:
If you are looking for something a little bit unusual and fun, this miniature felt mouse sculpture would be a very good choice.

The collectible mouse is called Mika the Mouse and not only would he love to sit anywhere in your home and bring a bit of joy, he would also make a wonderful gift being beautifully presented in a box with a lovely strawberry and mouse design by Faisal Khouja.

He is handmade to order by Laura Mirjami and he is weighted down so that he stays firmly in place and would also make a perfect miniature paperweight.

Mika is one of the characters that Laura Mirjami has created inspired by her magical childhood amongst the creatures, forests, lakes and beaches of Finland.

Mika the Mouse is handmade from 100% wool felt fabrics, filled with Eco-friendly polyester and steel pellets.

Eyes and nose are semi-precious stone onyx and tail is handmade cord from woollen thread.

Whiskers are cotton.

Approx. height 4.5cm, width 5cm x depth 5cm, approx. 120g

Please note: As this item is individually handmade it will vary slightly from the photographs. Thus each mouse has a look of its own which makes each one unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Miniature Henry The Harvest Mouse
description:
Meet Henry the Harvest mouse, a cute collectible mouse soft sculpture.

He is handmade to order by Laura Mirjami and he would make a lovely addition to your home as he loves sitting on a mantle piece or on your desk watching the world go by.

He would also make a wonderful present as he comes in a lovely presentation box with a beautiful wheat and mouse pattern by Faisal Khouja.

Henry is also weighted making sure that he won't topple over and he would also make a lovely miniature felt mouse paperweight.

Henry the Harvest Mouse is one of the many characters that Laura has created inspired by her magical childhood amongst the creatures, forests, lakes and beaches of Finland.

Henry the Harvest Mouse is handmade from 100% wool felt fabrics.

His eyes and nose are semi-precious stone onyx. The tail is handmade twisted cord from wool.

Filled with Eco-friendly polyester and steel pellets.

Approx. height 4.5cm, width 5cm, depth 5cm, approx. 120g

Please note: As this item is individually handmade it will vary slightly from the photographs. Thus each mouse has a look of its own which makes each one unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Miniature Soft Sculpture Fox
description:
This handsome felt Findlay the Fox is a lovely miniature soft sculpture that would add a lovely bit of colour and fun to your home.

Findlay would make a wonderfully special gift being collectible and beautifully presented in a lovely presentation box with a lovely horse chestnut and fox pattern by Faisal Khouja.

He is carefully handmade to order by Laura Mirjami with attention to detail. He is also weighted so that he is standing firmly without toppling over and would make a lovely little paperweight.

Findlay the Fox is one of the many characters that Laura has created inspired by her magical childhood amongst the creatures, forests, lakes and beaches of Finland.

Findlay the Fox is handmade from 100% wool felt fabrics, filled with Eco-friendly polyester and steel pellets.

The eyes are small glass beads and nose is semi-precious stone onyx.

Approx. weight 9cm, width 6cm, depth 6.5cm, approx. 120g

Please note: As this item is individually handmade it will vary slightly from the photographs. Thus each fox has a look of its own which makes each one unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Miniature Soft Sculpture Bat
description:
This quirky felt sculpture, Benny the Bat, would make a lovely and joyful addition to your home.

He is handmade to order by Laura Mirjami with attention to detail and lightly weighted so that he could be a miniature paperweight too.

Benny would also make a lovely gift as he comes in a beautiful presentation box and even though the box has a wonderful pumpkin and bat decoration by Faisal Khouja we must remember that a bat is not only for Halloween!

Benny the Bat is the latest character that Laura has created inspired by a magical childhood amongst the creatures, forests, lakes and beaches of Finland.

Handmade from 100% wool felt fabric and genuine leather, filled with Eco-friendly polyester and steel pellets.

Eye and nose are semi-precious stone onyx and the friendly fangs are cotton thread.

Approx. height 5.5cm, width (main body) 4.5cm (wing span 11cm), depth 4.5cm, approx 100g

Please note: As this item is individually handmade it will vary slightly from the photographs. Thus each bat has a look of its own which makes each one unique, little individual.

name: Wide Eyed Owl Notebook
description:
Here is a fun and practical owl notebook.

The fabulous wide eyed owl print is so loved by us and our customers that we have come up with this lovely A5 size notebook that is perfect to fit into your bag or keep somewhere handy in the house to record your thoughts, shopping lists etc.

It would also make a lovely little present that is fun yet hugely practical.

The notebook comes with a removable strip of paper which states its size and the page amount.

To keep the notebook clean and tidy we present it in a smart cellophane bag.

A single notebook is £4.99, but you can buy two for £9 or three for £12.

40 blank 80gms white pages.

Printed and bound in Britain.

A5, H21 x 14.8cm

name: Handmade Monty The Giant Mouse
description:
Meet Monty the giant leather mouse sculpture with a shiny onyx nose and curious black eyes.

Monty the giant mouse would make a wonderful addition to your home or a delightful present and he would most certainly make a great talking point and bring a smile to your face!

He is individually handmade using beautiful natural leather and British woollen fabric both locally sourced near our studio in the Cotswolds.

Being filled with natural sand and recycled polyester he is also quite heavy and therefore this handsome mouse would happily stand guard on a bookshelf or even hold a door open.

Handmade using genuine brown leather from a family run wholesaler in Somerset and British woollen fabric from our local mill.

Eyes and nose are onyx, whiskers are black leather, filled with sand and eco-friendly polyester.

Please note: as this item is handmade and natural leather has some irregular blemishes the item may vary slightly in size, colour and look from the photographs. Thus making each sculpture unique individual.

Approx. height: 16cm high, width 16 cm, depth 16 cm.

Approx. weight: 1.5 kg

name: Handmade Twiggy the Owl Bookmark
description:
Here is a charming handmade Twiggy the owl bookmark to keep you company while you read.

It would make a perfect gift for bookworms with a love for animals.

Its quirky design makes it stand out from your average bookmark and is guaranteed to bring a smile to your face peering out from your bookshelf.

Being handmade it has an individual character of its own and it could make even a tedious read fun!

Twiggy is available in turquoise woollen fabric with a brown leather cord, turquoise felt with white leather cord, green felt with white cord or brown/grey felt with white cord.

The eyes are black glass beads and eye brows are wool.

Little Twiggy is sewn on to a strip of leather which goes in between the book pages and keeps him standing straight on top of the book.

Twiggy the owl comes attractively packaged being attached to a brown luggage label.

The owl stands approximately 3cm tall giving a total length of approximately 30cm to the entire bookmark including the leather cord.

Please note: as the owl is individually handmade it may vary ever so slightly in size and shape thus making each one unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Fergal The Leather Fox
description:
Add touch of delight and a definite talking point to your home with this beautifully handmade very handsome Fergal the leather fox sculpture.

Fergal the leather fox would make a wonderful gift for those who value natural materials and good craftsmanship.

He is individually handmade in our Cotswolds studio from natural leather and British woollen fabric, both sourced as locally as possible.

Being filled with natural sand he is also quite heavy and therefore he would happily stand guard on a bookshelf or even hold a door open.

Fergal is handmade from natural brown leather and British woollen fabric. He is filled with sand and eco-friendly polyester.

Eyes and nose are semi-precious black stone onyx.

Please note: as this item is handmade and natural leather has some irregular blemishes the item may vary slightly in size, colour and look from the photographs. Thus making each sculpture unique individual.

Approx. height: 32 cm, width: 18cm wide

Approx. weight: 1.5 kg

name: Handmade Pedro The Penguin Bookmark
description:
This is Pedro the penguin felt bookmark who would love to keep you company while you read.

It would also make a perfect gift for bookworms with a love for animals and it is nearly guaranteed to make you smile.

Tho bookmark is handmade from black and white felt and filled with eco-friendly polyester.

The eyes are black glass beads.

The little penguin is attached to a strip of white leather which goes in between the book pages and keeps him standing straight on top of the book.

It comes attractively packaged being attached to a brown luggage label.

The penguin stands approximately 4cm tall giving a total length of approximately 30cm to the entire bookmark including the leather cord.

Please note: as the bookmark is individually handmade it may vary from the photographs thus making each one unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Findlay the Fox Bookmark
description:
Here is a charming Findlay the fox bookmark to keep you company while you read.

It would make a colourful and cheerful gift for bookworms with a love for animals or those who would like a little bit of brightness to their lives.

Its quirky design makes it stand out from your average bookmark and is guaranteed to bring a smile to your face peering out from your bookshelf.

The fox is handmade from orange, red and white felt. The eyes and nose are black glass beads. It is filled with eco-friendly polyester.

It is attached to a strip of white leather which goes in between the book pages and keeps him standing straight on top of the book.

Findlay the fox bookmark comes attractively packaged being attached to a brown luggage label.

The fox stands approximately 4cm tall giving a total length of approximately 30cm to the entire bookmark including the leather cord.

Please note: as the bookmark is individually handmade it may vary slightly from the photographs thus making each one unique, little individual.

name: Handmade Mika The Mouse Bookmark
description:
Here is a charming Mika the mouse bookmark to keep you company while you read.

Mika the Mouse bookmark would make a perfect gift for bookworms with a love for animals or for those who just fancy an bit of delight to their daily lifes.

His quirky design makes him stand out from your average bookmark and is guaranteed to bring a smile to your face peering out from your bookshelf.

Being made by hand he has an individual character of his own and he should make even a tedious read fun for everyone.

Mika the Mouse bookmark is available in either grey felt with pink leather ears or in a Liberty fabric cotton.

The mouse is handmade from grey felt or Liberty Tana Lawn. The ears are pink leather and the eyes and the nose are black glass beads.

Little Mika is sewn on to a strip of pink leather which goes in between the book pages and keeps him standing straight on top of the book.

Mika the mouse comes attractively packaged being attached to a brown luggage label.

Please note: as the items are all hand crafted they may vary ever so slightly in size and shape.

The mouse stands approximately 3cm tall giving a total length of approximately 30cm to the entire bookmark including the leather cord.

name: Handmade Ozzy the Leather Owl
description:
Ozzy the leather Owl is a wonderful sculpture for home and he can make even the most serious person to smile.

He would also prove a talking point in any proud home and he would make a wonderful present for those who appreciate good quality craftsmanship and natural materials.

Being filled with natural sand he is also quite heavy and therefore this handsome brown owl will happily stand guard on a bookshelf or even hold a door open.

The owl is handmade using genuine brown leather and British woollen fabric from our local mill. The eyes are black glass and filling is eco-friendly polyester and natural sand.

Please note: as this item is handmade and natural leather has some irregular blemishes the item may vary slightly in size, colour and look from the photographs. Thus making each sculpture unique individual.

Approx. height 20cm, width 17cm, depth 17 cm.

Approx. weight: 1.5 kg

name: Handmade Graduation Owl Paperweight
description:
This is a wonderful handmade graduation owl paperweight.

It is full of wisdom and knowledge of life and it would make a perfect graduation present.

Being weighted it makes a great paperweight and it loves to keep important papers in order.

The owl is also a wonderful mascot of good luck whether it is your exams you need luck with or life in general!

It makes a delightful present and can make even the most serious person smile!

You can choose a personal message like: "Good luck at your exams" or "Congratulations on your Graduation".

Or you can use any other short message of your choice that will be printed on a label and attached to the inside of the presentation box. Please email us separately with your chosen message.

The owl is filled with eco-friendly polyester and steel pellets which makes it heavy in weight. Its eyes are glass and eyebrows are woollen thread.

The owl is handmade by using British woollen fabrics from our local mill.

The graduation hat is made from black felt.

The owl comes in recycled paper box with red tissue paper.

Approx. size: height 9cm, width 8cm, depth 8cm

Please note: as the owl is individually handmade it may vary from the photograph thus making each one unique little individual.

name: Handmade Giant Mouse Doorstop
description:
This is  fabulous handmade mouse doorstop made from British woollen fabrics.

It is sturdy enough to keep even a heavier door well stopped from closing. However, it is equally happy to be placed somewhere else in your home to bring delight and unique charm.

The mouse is based on the original Paperweight Mouse design from Mirjami Design Paperweight Collection and it is a perfect addition to the collection: from little to large!

The mouse is handmade from British woollen fabrics from our local mill and it is a limited edition of 40.

It is filled with eco-friendly polyester and natural sand.

The tail is twisted leather and eyes are glass. The nose is black onyx bead.

Please note: as this item is handmade it may vary slightly from the photographs. Thus making each one unique individual.

Approx size: 18 x 18 x 18 cm

Approx weight: 1.2 kg

Other colours can be made from request. Please get in touch via contact form or by emaiing: contact@mirjamidesign.com

name: Wide Eyed Owl Print
description:
A stunning owl print with most mesmerizing eyes as any Wide Eyed Owl should have!

This cute owl print would make a perfect addition to your home to keep an eye on things!

The print is an open edition giclee reproduction print from an original water colour painting by Faisal Khouja, Mirjami Design’s chief illustrator, who used Mirjami Design’s quirky paperweight owls as his inspiration.

The print can be purchased either unframed or framed in rustic white, stony blue green or black.

It is printed on high quality matte paper.

Please note: keep away from direct sunshine.

Unframed size: A4

Framed size: height 30 cm, width 25 cm
